p: Five strains were used in this study: D. hansenii DhTun2015 (Acc. Num KY5083343.1) and Y. lipolytica YlTun15 (Acc. Num MF327143.1) isolated from Tunisian farmed Dicentrarchus labrax scales and gills, respectively; C. tenuis CtTun15 isolated farmed Sparus aurata coproduct Acc. Num KY558632.1); R. mucilaginosa RmTun15 isolated from shallow water (La Goulette, Tunisia) (Acc. Num MF327252.1) and T. asahii TaTun15 isolated from shrimpâ€™s waste (Acc. Number KY509046.1).
